com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting

Class IconSetCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.FormatCondition
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.conditionalformatting.IconSetCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gembox.spreadsheet.internal.styles.CellFormatDataFormatHolder

    public final class IconSetCondition
extends FormatCondition
    Represents a condition that formats all cells based on their values by displaying an icon from the specified icon set according to cell's value.
    See Also:
    Excel Conditional Formatting example

      • getConditionType

        public FormatConditionType getConditionType()
        Gets the FormatConditionType.ICON_SET value.
        Specified by:
        getConditionType in class FormatCondition
        Returns:

      • getIcons

        public ConditionalIconCollection getIcons()
        Gets the icons.
        Returns:
        The icons.

      • getIconStyle

        public SpreadsheetIconStyle getIconStyle()

        Gets the icon style for all icons contained in the icons collection.

        If icons are of different SpreadsheetIconStyle or are not ordered, then SpreadsheetIconStyle.CUSTOM is returned.

        Returns:
        The icon style for all icons contained in the icons collection.

      • isReverseIconOrder

        public boolean isReverseIconOrder()

        Gets a value indicating whether the order of icons should be reversed.

        Default value is false.

        Returns:
        true if the order of icons should be reversed; otherwise, false.

      • isShowIconOnly

        public boolean isShowIconOnly()

        Gets a value indicating whether to show icon only.

        Default value is false (cell value is shown together with icon).

        Returns:
        true to show icon only; otherwise, false.

      • setIconStyle

        public void setIconStyle(SpreadsheetIconStyle iconStyle)

        Sets the icon style for all icons contained in the icons collection.

        Parameters:
        iconStyle - The icon style for all icons contained in the icons collection.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Icon style is set to SpreadsheetIconStyle.NONE or SpreadsheetIconStyle.CUSTOM.

      • setReverseIconOrder

        public void setReverseIconOrder(boolean reverseIconOrder)

        Sets a value indicating whether the order of icons should be reversed.

        Default value is false.

        Parameters:
        reverseIconOrder - true if the order of icons should be reversed; otherwise, false.

      • setShowIconOnly

        public void setShowIconOnly(boolean showIconOnly)

        Sets a value indicating whether to show icon only.

        Default value is false (cell value is shown together with icon).

        Parameters:
        showIconOnly - true to show icon only; otherwise, false.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a String that represents this IconSetCondition instance.

        This method should be used primarily for debugging purposes and should be considered volatile (format of its return value might change in future versions).

        Specified by:
        toString in class FormatCondition
        Returns:
        A String that represents this IconSetCondition instance.
